page-layout: custom
css: styles/404.css
include-in-header:
  text: |
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
    <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
    <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cormorant:ital,wght@0,400;0,500;1,400&family=Instrument+Sans:wght@400;500&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;600&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
    <meta name="robots" content="noindex">
---

```{=html}
<main class="nf-main">
  <section class="nf-hero">
    <div class="nf-code">404</div>
    <h1 class="nf-title">This page has wandered off</h1>
    <p class="nf-subtitle">
      The page you're looking for doesn't exist, or perhaps it moved somewhere else.
    </p>
    <code class="nf-path" id="nf-path"></code>
  </section>

  <nav class="nf-nav">
    <a class="nf-card nf-card--home" href="/index.html">
      <span class="nf-card__icon">⌂</span>
      Home
    </a>
    <a class="nf-card nf-card--technical" href="/technical.html">
      <span class="nf-card__icon">⚙</span>
      Technical
    </a>
    <a class="nf-card nf-card--personal" href="/personal.html">
      <span class="nf-card__icon">✎</span>
      Personal
    </a>
  </nav>

  <footer class="nf-footer">
    <p>Or try <a href="/all.html">browsing all posts</a></p>
  </footer>
</main>

<script>
  (function () {
    var el = document.getElementById("nf-path");
    if (el && window.location.pathname !== "/404.html") {
      el.textContent = window.location.pathname;
      el.style.display = "inline-block";
    } else if (el) {
      el.style.display = "none";
    }
  })();
</script>
```
